current_state: DevOps expertise is concentrated in a single part-time resource, creating a critical bottleneck and single point of failure.
recommended_action: Dedicate 8 hours in Sprint 2 for the DevOps Lead to pair-program with a Senior Backend Developer on Terraform and GitHub Actions pipeline maintenance.
expected_benefit: Reduces key-person dependency by 50%. Enables the backend team to self-service minor infrastructure changes, reducing wait times.
success_metrics: At least one backend developer can confidently approve and merge a minor Terraform change.
roi_calculation: Avoids an estimated 1-2 day delay per sprint waiting on DevOps, saving approximately $2000 per sprint in developer downtime.
